Had heard about this now classic game for years and finally played it.  Wow!  I could not stop going from puzzle to puzzle and the writing for the characters is just amazing.  I'm in stitches listening to them.  Can't wait to play the original Portal 1 and complain that Portal 3 is never going to be a thing.
I love portal... so fucking much........

What's really to say about Portal 2 that hasn't already been said?  It's one of the best puzzle games I've played countless times when I owned it on PS3 and I am glad to finally have it on steam.  This game is funny, clever, and not too challenging that it's ever frustrating, but not too easy that you can just blow through it.  The cooperative mode is also great.  Portal 2 will always be in my top 10 video games ever.
One of the, if THE best action-puzzle game off all time.
A sequência perfeita, pra uma franquia perfeita

A game that will make you fall for it, well thought out puzzles and something that you can keep coming back to and improving your score / time / No.of portals used etc.

One of my all time favorites. 10/10

I absolutely loved this game, it was the most original and entertaining game I've played since Half-Life 2.  I have to admit I bought it years ago but got a bit stuck early on as there's no real tutorial so gave up.  I picked it up again and decided to persevere and am so glad I did!  Things I love:

Completely original concept and implementation
Fabulous characterisation and genuinely entertaining plot
Never repetitive, new challenges/puzzles are introduced throughout
Challenging but never too difficult - the clues are there, and every time I thought I was stuck I was able to come back to the game and see something I'd missed
Very long and varied - not just endless puzzles/rooms but plenty of travel/action as well to break the monotony

Overall just an excellent excellent game and a steal at £7!
Nostalgia strucks, and it strucks good
